value: directions=South side of the village on Hwy 11

content=This abandoned sugar factory houses a prominent artist community.  It is a fantastic place to see the works and studio space of the local and sometimes not so local artists. Weekends often have music performances on the stage.
address=One block north of the 7-11 follow the road and the signs up about 2km.
content=Archaeological site, two really, containing stonework.
address=Just north of the 142 km marker.
directions=Take the concrete lane to the beach.
content=This little spot is a few kilometers north of Dulan and is popular with the locals.   If you have your own board this is a good place to go.
directions=On the North side of town across the bridge.
hours=Sat & Sun 11:30AM-8:30PM, bread and sauces available all week

content=
Excellent fresh baked bread and homemade sauces all week, Saturday and Sunday fresh pasta meals, including soup/salad, fresh bread and drink. Owned and operated by Dave and Rolly Marino.
content=Provides sort of bohemian atmosphere in which to drink beer.
content=Offers two double rooms.  Kitchen, DVD, book exchange.
